solidstack.io
Class BufferedResource

java.lang.Object
  solidstack.io.Resource
      solidstack.io.MemoryResource
          solidstack.io.BufferedResource

public class BufferedResource
extends MemoryResource

A resource that remembers the original resource so that resolve(String) and getLastModified() keep working.

Author:
René de Bloois
